mapper.sql: select id, salary_project_id, com_pro, com_mon, per_pro, per_mon, base_ucl, base_ll, deci_bit, carry_mode, pay_area_id, effect_date, version, creator, creator_id, create_date from human_hs_social_security
mapper.select: select id, salary_project_id, com_pro, com_mon, per_pro, per_mon, base_ucl, base_ll, deci_bit, carry_mode, pay_area_id, effect_date, version, creator, creator_id, create_date from human_hs_social_security where pay_area_id = (select pay_area_id from human_hs_social_security_company where comp_id = #{compId})
mapper.insert:
insert into human_hs_social_security
id, salary_project_id, com_pro, com_mon, per_pro, per_mon, base_ucl, base_ll, deci_bit, carry_mode, pay_area_id, effect_date, version, creator, creator_id, create_date,
#{id}, #{salaryProjectId}, #{comPro}, #{comMon}, #{perPro}, #{perMon}, #{baseUcl}, #{baseLl}, #{deciBit}, #{carryMode}, #{payAreaId}, #{effectDate}, #{version}, #{creator}, #{creatorId}, #{createDate},
mapper.select: SELECT distinct version FROM human_hs_social_security WHERE pay_area_id = #{payAreaId} order by version
select effect_date effectDate, version from human_hs_social_security where pay_area_id = #{payAreaId} order by effect_date desc limit 1
mapper.delete:
delete from human_hs_social_security where id in
#{id}
delete from human_hs_social_security where pay_area_id = #{payAreaId} and version= #{version}
mapper.select:
select id, salary_project_id, com_pro, com_mon, per_pro, per_mon, base_ucl, base_ll, deci_bit, carry_mode, pay_area_id, effect_date, version, creator, creator_id, create_date from human_hs_social_security
and salary_project_id = #{salaryProjectId}
